title: Toxic player report

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So this player was going jungle, and I went to leash as I always do. We were hitting the blue and he started pinging me with the exclamation sign. I didn't really got what he meant, I guessed he was worried about me getting the last hit, which of course I wouldn't do. I continued leashing and he just went away and left the blue hit me. Then he came to bot lane and managed to get every CS with his skills. As and adc  I couldn't get much cs which led to lose the lane.

Before the game ends he started insulting me and typing in ALL chat. I reported him but I don't think it will be enough so here I put the evidence so a moderator can ban him or something.

greetings

replies.body: We can't manually take reports from the boards since the game that it happened in isn't linked in any way. We need to have that game attached in order to really take action, so those reports in post-game are the best way to get something done!
